name: SpiralOS Holon
description: Defines the holarchic relationship among SpiralOS Volumes. Each Volume is both a whole and a part (a holon) in the greater SpiralOS continuum.

hasPart.name: Child Holon
hasPart.description: A sub-volume or nested holon within a higher Volume.

isPartOf.name: Parent Holon
isPartOf.description: A higher-level Volume or meta-holon that contains this one.
